work.name: +1 Fitness Intro
work.description: +1 STR Fitness is a parody video work-out series for the popular video game-focused website Destructoid. While assisting in the production of this video, I created a simple motion graphic that introduced the website's brand and the title of the show, while maintaining the already established graphic style of the website.
work.skills: Photoshop, After Effects, Premiere, Motion Graphics

work.name: Mechanical Man
work.description: This is just something I built with Maya.

work.name: Robo
work.description: This illustration was primarily a practice in perspective. Photoshop's transform tool was used liberally to assist in establishing perspective. Blending and masking was also used to add texture and shading to the subjects.

work.name: Squid Pop Pin
work.description: My band Pachuca needed pins for promotion. I created this design under the direction of Squid Pop -a term that encompasses "fun", "the beach", and "a bit of weirdness."

work.name: The Woodpile
work.description: This was a assignment in a graphic design course that called for a graphical interpretation of song lyrics. I chose the song The Woodpile by Frightened Rabbit, a song that describes a person's social anxiety and desperation. The narrator is portrayed with an image of shoes as to be grounded in his own reality, while the rest of the room is portrayed as glowing silhouettes that appear to have ascended into a perceived magical existence. The yellow text creates a barrier between the red passion of the room and of the narrator.

work.name: Fingerling
work.description:
This is a model texture reskin I created for the PC Game Killing Floor 2 via Steam Workshop. Original assets from Tripwire Interactive.

The item can be found here: Steam Community Workshop

work.description:
This is a model texture reskin I created for the PC Game Killing Floor 2 via Steam Workshop. Original assets from Tripwire Interactive.

work.name: Ugly Thing
work.description: This is an attempt to draw something ugly.

work.name: Game Level Design
work.description: This is a mock-up mobile-game level created primarily through Adobe Illustrator. The purple circles outline the placement for mobile touch controls.

work.name: Separate Suns
work.description: This was a pattern created for a 2d design course. This pattern was a practice in contrast between geometric and organic shapes and complementary colors. It portrays a seperation between humans from nature as well as humans from eachother. The warmer use of colors is used to convey a discomforting, claustrophobic sensation.

work.name: RichHuynh.com
work.description: This website was built with CMS-like features (where content is stored as data in which html is generated for).This allows me to add new content quickly and efficiently. Because this website is hosted on github (no database functionality), content is stored as xml.
